oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Embroidered postcard from Earl Bee to Walter Ragsdale
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: World War I era postcard is embroidered in silk with the U.S. flag, an American eagle, and thirteen gold stars. Handwritten message on backside greets Walter Ragsdale, "guess your big Sailor bro has landed by now. you [sic] can put this on your auto so you can fly Earl Bee."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
